mobs.LongDesc: A pink bunny rabbit hops around carrying goodies.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
How cute, a pink furry bunny with a basket full of treats.
It hops around giving out colored eggs to little children.

mobs.LongDesc: A thirty foot tall giant bunny hops along, nearly crushing you!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This bunny is HUGE! It hops around without a care, squashing
whatever it happens to land on. You better stay back, this
bunny is nothing but trouble.

mobs.LongDesc: Before you stands the ultimate evil in the universe, Barney the purple Dinosaur!
mobs.DetailedDesc: It's him. Barney. 'nuff said.

mobs.LongDesc: Barney stands here spreading his filthy happiness!
Beavis says "I AM THE GREAT CORNHOLIO! I NEED T.P. FOR MY BUNGHOLE!"
mobs.DetailedDesc: Beavis is a complete Moron..you are surprised to see them actually draw breath they are so stupid...that you thought they sometimes forget to breath..:)

mobs.ShortDesc: Butthead stands here picking his nose and laughing at Beavis's stupid antics.
mobs.DetailedDesc: One word......WOW! You never realized how smart you were till you stood next to Butthead...now what kind of name *is* Butthead..?

mobs.LongDesc: The Red Lion of Voltron is here to be challenged.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Sleek and Deadly, the left arm of Voltron stands here awaiting your challenge.

mobs.LongDesc: The Green Lion is here awaiting your challenge.
The Blue Lion of Voltron is here awaiting your challenge.
The Yellow Lion of Voltron is here awaiting your challenge.
The Black Lion of Voltron stands here awaiting your challenge.

mobs.ShortDesc: the Red Right Arm of Voltron
mobs.LongDesc: The Red Right Arm of Voltron is ready to attack.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Because now that you defeated the lions you know must face the full strength
of Voltron.

mobs.LongDesc: The Green Arm is ready to attack you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Because you have defeated the 5 lions, you must now face their combined
strength.

mobs.LongDesc: The Blue Leg of Voltron is here waiting to attack.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Because you have defeated the 5 lions, You know must face Voltron to win.

mobs.LongDesc: The Yellow Leg of Voltron is here to attack... YOU!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: You have defeated the 5 lions. Congratulations, you must now face Voltron now!

mobs.LongDesc: The Black Body of Voltron is ready to go into action.
mobs.DetailedDesc: You have mastered the 5 lions. Now master their combined strengths!

mobs.LongDesc: Rocky is tearing down a few bushes and causing general havoc
Adam is walking around tearing up anything that he sees planted.
Katherine is making a mess and disturbing the peace in general.
Tonya is breaking store windows and walking off with goods for evil purposes.
Tommy is just having fun chucking garbage cans at whoever walks by.
Jason is here to see who looks good being used as a punching bag.
The Pink Zeo Ranger is just beating up whoever is in her way.
The Yellow Zeo Ranger is just blasting away the competition.
The Blue Zeo Ranger is just causing havoc.
The Green Zeo Ranger is just kicking ass and taking names.
The Riddle Monster is here to kill you!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Riddle Monster stands in front of you...and he's about to tear you
apart.  Run for your life!

mobs.LongDesc: The Red Zeo Ranger is just slashing anyone who gets near him with his sword.
The Gold Ranger stands ready to battle with anyone who dares to challenge him.
The Red Zeo Zord is destroying everything in sight.
The Yellow Zeo Zord is casuing havoc to the citizens of Angel Grove.
The Blue Super Zeo Zord is blasting buildings to bits.
The Pink Zeo Zord is vaporizing parts of Angel Grove High.
The Green Zeo Zord is looking to make Bulk and Skull into human pancakes.
A Powerful warrior from the past is assisting the Rangers by destroying the "evil" morts of RoI.
The Left Arm of the Super Zeo MegaZord is destroying a nearby building.
The Right Arm of the Super Zeo MegaZord is breaking guilders left and right.
The Head and the Body of the Super Zeo Zord are blasting holes in the ground.
The Left Leg and Foot of the Super Zeo MegaZord is crushing a house.
The Right Leg and Foot of the Super Zeo MegaZord is putting cracks in the road.
The Biggest Wheel that has ever been seen is rolling straight towards you!
The Red Battle Zord is blasting to bits everyone and everything.
A beam from Pyrimidas is vaporizing everything!
A pyrimid stands here.  It looks HUGE!!!!
A Huntress Rose stands here, heralding the coming of the Ascension.
A lion lurks in the shadows.
A shadow follows you, and prepares to attack!
The hunt is over! The predator has found you!
The Lag Monster is here, slowing down players until they die from boredom.
Death flirts with you.
The floor quivers whe you step on it.
The red herring stands here trying to hide.
An experience egg lays here. Kill it quick!
A prize egg cowers here! Kill it quick!
Death flirts with you.
Kitskuf the Dragon is here to end you quest!
The Princess Wilimina is here overjoyed to see you!

mobs.ShortDesc: a Black Goblin is here aiding Kitskuf!
mobs.LongDesc: A fat disgusting Goblin is here aiding the Dragon.
Eyedol is here wielding his HUGE club.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This monster has 2 heads and looks like he could kick your butt hardcore!!

mobs.LongDesc: Fulgore the metal monster stands here!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: This is a HUGE man made of metal.

mobs.LongDesc: Spinal, the undead killer longs for you to join him!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: This ia a being raised from the dead by Ultratech.

mobs.LongDesc: Riptor is here, waiting to tear your heart out!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: This is a product of Ultratechs DNA progress. This dinosaur looks mean!!

mobs.LongDesc: Saberwolf is here, wanting to feast on your blood!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: This is a man struck by lycanthropy. He fights to gain the cure for his disease.

mobs.LongDesc: Jago the tibetan monk is here,
mobs.DetailedDesc: This is a tibetan monk. He looks pretty deadly.

mobs.LongDesc: Glacius the alien is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This man looks very cold. You wonder where his homeworld is???

mobs.LongDesc: T. J. Combo is here, wearing some HUGE boxing gloves.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This black man is HUGE. I wouldnt want to be on his bad side.

mobs.LongDesc: Thunder is here wielding 2 very nasty looking axes.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This Indian is very stoic looking. He prolly just ignores pain.

mobs.LongDesc: Cinder is here, burning a hole in the ground.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This man is a pure flame. He looks very hot.

mobs.LongDesc: Orchid the hotty is here, she HATES men.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Orchid is a very good looking woman. Too bad she wants to KILL you!!!

mobs.LongDesc: April is just wandering around Midgarrd
A training bag is here for you to vent your anger out on.
An evil looking mage stands between you and the maiden.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The mage is dressed in a long flowing black robe, gold trims the edges.
His long white beard hangs to this chest.  His silvery hair mostly
covered by a wizards hate made of the same color as his robe, blows
gently in the breeze.  His eyes flare up as he notices you.  He is
ready to slay all those that oppose him.
